titleStmt.title: A breife recantacion of maystres Missa and howe she accuseth the slouthfulnesse of her chapleyns, with her lamentable departyng vnto her father the Pope. 1.5 4.8.
titleStmt.author: I. M., fl. 1548.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The recantacion of maystres missa.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
